configs.title: Basic Flowchart
configs.config:
graph TD
    A[Start] --> B{Is it?}
    B -- Yes --> C[OK]
    B -- No --> D[End]

configs.title: Sequence Diagram
configs.config:
sequenceDiagram
    Alice->>John: Hello John, how are you?
    loop Healthcheck
        John->>John: Fight against hypochondria
    end
    Note right of John: Rational thoughts!
    John-->>Alice: Great!
    John->>Bob: How about you?
    Bob-->>John: Jolly good!

configs.title: Class Diagram
configs.config:
classDiagram
    Animal <|-- Duck
    Animal <|-- Fish
    Animal : +int age
    Animal : +String gender
    Animal: +isMammal()
    class Duck{
      +String beakColor
      +swim()
      +quack()
    }

configs.title: State Diagram
configs.config:
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> Still
    Still --> [*]
    Still --> Moving
    Moving --> Still
    Moving --> Crash
    Crash --> [*]

configs.title: Entity Relationship
configs.config:
erDiagram
    CUSTOMER ||--o{ ORDER : places
    ORDER ||--|{ LINE-ITEM : contains
    CUSTOMER }|..|{ DELIVERY-ADDRESS : uses

configs.title: User Journey
configs.config:
journey
    title My working day
    section Go to work
      Make tea: 5: Me
      Go upstairs: 3: Me
      Do work: 1: Me, Cat
    section Go home
      Go downstairs: 5: Me
      Sit down: 5: Me

configs.title: Gantt Chart
configs.config:
gantt
    title A Gantt Diagram
    dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD
    section Section
    A task :a1, 2024-01-01, 30d
    Another task :after a1, 20d
    section Another
    Task in sec :2024-01-12, 12d
    another task : 24d

configs.title: Pie Chart
configs.config:
pie title What do we spend time on?
    "Development" : 40
    "Testing" : 20
    "Documentation" : 15
    "Meetings" : 25

configs.title: Git Graph
configs.config:
gitGraph
    commit
    commit
    branch develop
    checkout develop
    commit
    commit
    checkout main
    merge develop
    commit
    commit

configs.title: Complex Flowchart
configs.config:
graph TB
    sq[Square shape] --> ci((Circle shape))
    ci --> ro{Rhombus}
    ro -->|Yes| ra[/Parallelogram/]
    ro -->|No| tr[\\Trapezoid\\]
    tr --> hp{Hexagon}
    hp --> ou[/Output/]
